summary: "Tom and Jerry" is an American animated series created in 1940 by William Hanna and Joseph Barbera. It features a cat (Tom) trying to catch a mouse (Jerry), with 161 short films made by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. The series won seven Academy Awards for Best Animated Short Film. After the original run, more shorts were made by different directors. The franchise includes TV shows, movies, and even a musical. It's one of the most popular animated series of all time.
title: Tom and Jerry
